characterDescription:
Mrun is one of nine that had been selected from among the two thousand listener survivors, Venli included, to embrace the power of the Everstorm.
Afterward, he pulls himself past a large boulder, and although Mrun has been blessed with a tall, imperious form like that of Demid and Melu, he stumbles as he steps away from the boulder. He grabs the stone, then falls to his knees. His body courses with dark violet light, and he groans, muttering gibberish.
